title: Drawing, "Design for a Sugar Bowl", October 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: 46
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: SUCRIER (C)/DIAMETRE 8 cms/HAUTEUR 9 cms 75; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/10.41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Pear-shaped sugar-bowl flared at the top drawn in elevation, with applied scallop-edged lower body indicated in yellow pastel to be executed in ivory. Underdrawing in graphite of sugar bowl in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Sugar Bowl", October 1941.
October 1941. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-74.
